column4: can i make a symlink which replicates the files to two folders? like i have one folder where i write my files but i want to see my files also in two other folders
you can symlink the directory to another directory.. or as many directories as you wish
ah you are right thats what i wanted thank you
check the man page for ln.. man ln  .. also 'ln -s' is the command you may want to use
